Execution of processes or API calls atte.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for processes executing commands or making API calls (if feasible through advanced logging/EDR) related to system locale, timezone, or language settings (e.g., 'GetLocaleInfoW'). Use frequency analysis to identify unusual or rare processes executing these checks.

Network connections from internal system.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections originating from internal IPs to a list of known external IP geolocation lookup service domains/IPs (e.g., ip-api.com, ipinfo.io). Identify sources of these connections and analyze connection frequency and volume using descriptive statistics.
